meanings.definition: Not opened or not having been opened.
meanings.sent1: The unopened box sat on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: The store had many unopened packages.
meanings.sent3: The unopened gift remained a mystery.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt unopened to new experiences.
meanings.sent5: The unopened treasure chest held untold secrets.

meanings.definition: Not having been opened or not opened.
meanings.sent1: The unopened letter was still in the mailbox.
meanings.sent2: The unopened soda can was cold to the touch.
meanings.sent3: The unopened umbrella stayed dry in the rain.
meanings.sent4: His unopened mind missed out on new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The unopened book held stories waiting to be discovered.

meanings.definition: Not opened or not having been opened.
meanings.sent1: The unopened jar of jam was perfectly sealed.
meanings.sent2: The unopened envelope contained a surprise inside.
meanings.sent3: The unopened door led to a mysterious room.
meanings.sent4: His unopened eyes missed the beauty around him.
meanings.sent5: The unopened package held a special gift for her.
